item.description:
This is the same hike some of us, but not many of us, did last April.

Frank's plan is to leave most cars at his house and then go in a few cars to Ship Pond Road and park at Savery Road, not far from Rte 3A, and begin the hike. We would go into the woods to Morey Hole and walk along some old Boy Scout campgrounds, along some bogs, along Briggs Reservoir , through the woods and back to his house. This is about 5.5 miles of fairly level terrain. Should take about 3 hours.

Meet for breakfast at Metro's Cafe at 7:45 or be there by 8:45 to join us on the hike.

The image below is the GPS track in April.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Savery Road Gambol
